ygData.subject: RE: Why do they want Bronze?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Do you know the formula(s) that determine the weapon to hit, damage, ac, defense rolls, dodge, etc.? Having those would allow us to do a comparison. Cralis
ygData.messageBody:
>As your defense goes up banded gives you a significantly worse AC than
>bronze plate.

Do you know the formula(s) that determine the weapon to hit, damage, ac,
defense rolls, dodge, etc.? Having those would allow us to do a comparison.



Cralis Trueblade
Brother of the E'ci Trueblades
Original Brothers of the Guardian Archon
cralis@...
webmaster@...

"It is our creed that no evil shall stand, whether it be man or gnoll, in
the forest or the city, among friends or be an enemy. We shall hunt it down
wherever it lies, and stop it cold whenever we find it. We, the Trueblades,
shall have justice."
